content.raw: We haven't been very careful with the style in Python but we should start doing it if we're adding more files. We normally follow `pep8` rules for Python. Could you run `flake8` on your Python code and fix the style issues? \(e.g.: lines longer than 79 characters\). Could you also document at least the functions and parameters in the code?
content.html: We haven't been very careful with the style in Python but we should start doing it if we're adding more files. We normally follow pep8 rules for Python. Could you run flake8 on your Python code and fix the style issues? (e.g.: lines longer than 79 characters). Could you also document at least the functions and parameters in the code?
